ctx: intros net failed tr H n HIn.
exceptions.exn: The reference tr was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros net failed tr H n HIn.
exceptions.exn: The reference a was not found in the current environment.

original: simpl. intros net failed tr H n HIn. inversion H; subst; clear H. induction tr. - contradiction. - destruct a as [p i]. apply in_inv in HIn. destruct HIn as [HIn | HRest]. + subst. exists (init_handlers p). apply update_eq. + apply IHtr; auto. apply ordered_dynamic_uninitialized_state. * apply refl_trans_1n_n1_right in H0. apply in_remove_all_not_in with (a:=n). apply in_remove_all_preserve; auto. * intros HContra. apply HRest. apply all_names_nodes. apply nwState_exists_in; auto.
